channel.title: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )
channel.description:
[align=center][COLOR='Orange'][FONT='Century Gothic'][url='https://www.catzeyes93.com/images/BlackMesaCoversBoxart']BLACK MESA - DVD SLEEVES ( COVERS / BOXART ) thumbnails[/url][/FONT][/SIZE]
__________________________________________________[/align]
I posted these a long time ago in the old DVD Sleeves thread, but now that the mod is getting close to release and Ive finally gotten around to updating the assumed requirements, here they are again! [COLOR='DarkOrange'][b]Just click on the pics to be redirected to where you can download the full-size printable versions![/b]
Enjoy! :smiley:
[url='https://unhingedmouse0.deviantart.com/art/Black-Mesa-Cover-Artwork-01-79381979'][img]https://lpfstuff.webs.com/BMCover1_Unhinged_Amaray_3D.jpg[/img][/url]
[url='https://unhingedmouse0.deviantart.com/art/Black-Mesa-Cover-Artwork-02-79382087'][img]https://lpfstuff.webs.com/BMCover2_Unhinged_Amaray_3D.jpg[/img][/url]
Comments?

item.title: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
I guess you don’t watch Breaking Bad… :fffuuu:

Smat:

Disclaimer or not, it’s still my favorite cover of all the great stuff posted in this thread… this one’s going on the shelf!
<>
Thanks, Unhinged!

No prob and thanks so much for posting that pic! That right there is the reason I do this, it makes all the hours worth it to see something I made appreciated and in someone else’s hands.

item.title: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )
item.dc:creator: Smat
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Alrighty, updated covers are up! Mostly minor changes, sorry Smat. I approached these as though Xen and BMDM were still included in the original release since I personally see the whole thing as one project.

Disclaimer or not, it’s still my favorite cover of all the great stuff posted in this thread… this one’s going on the shelf!

Thanks, Unhinged!

item.title: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
Alrighty, updated covers are up! Mostly minor changes, sorry Smat. I approached these as though Xen and BMDM were still included in the original release since I personally see the whole thing as one project. I am toying with removing the BMDM part which is really only on the one cover, but I need to figure out what to fill the space with… it’s doesn’t look right when it’s empty. Ill post it here if I come up with something.
[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]
Click the images to get to the full-size flat printable versions.

Comments or corrections are welcome as always.

  • Changed requirements to match official statement.
  • Updated System Requirements to match official statement.
  • Updated Game Info.
  • A few other minor tweaks.

  • Changed requirements to match official statement.
  • Updated System Requirements to match official statement.
  • Updated Game Info.
  • Swapped out most screenshots to be up to date.[COLOR=‘PaleTurquoise’]*
  • A few other minor tweaks.

[COLOR=‘PaleTurquoise’]* Considering switching these back though. I sorta prefer the older shots really…

Read full topic

item.title: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )
item.dc:creator: Smat
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

You realise these were made more than 4 years ago?

Yup, of course. I didn’t like the disclaimer simply for aesthetic reasons. That is why I asked if UnhingedMouse0 might consider removing it now that we know Xen and DM will be released later…
Just my 2 cents.

Read full topic

You realise these were made more than 4 years ago?

item.source: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )

item.title: BLACK MESA - DVD Sleeves ( Covers / Box Art )
item.dc:creator: Smat
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Less than 7 days left… guess I’ll have to go back and update my two cover designs asap! Now that we’ve got the actual system requirements all that that fun mumbojumbo.

Cool! Please, please do so, I really like your design, especially the first one. The only detail that I didn’t like was the big disclaimer on the front which says ‘also included: BM Death Match’…
What’s the plan, will you remove it or make it even bigger, saying ‘NOT included: DM & Xen’?

Anyway, I’m looking forward to your update.

Read full topic
